segments.text: You know that this afternoon's meeting is cancelled , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why am I always the last to know these things ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sent out a notice . You've stopped checking your e-mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but Bean did send me like a hundred forwards today . My mailbox must have been overflowing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How obnoxious ! I heard he was sending you dirty jokes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He not only sent me nasty e-mail , but he's so bored , he even asked me to search the Net for even more forwards for him !
segments.speaker: S2
